Malice:
 
The discharge damaged the soft flesh on his elbows.  His right arm dropped a little, but his left remained.  The wounds began to heal, and Malice chuckled a little.
"My, that hurt a little.  I didn't expect that, though.  You thought I was going to kiss you?  You were right-"
He immediatly leaned down a kissed the femme on the lips.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare::

"I've tought that you would kiss me"asais seriuosly the femme" and 
it's eems that I havne't other choice to do this!!!! "

Blak Nightmare took Malice arms and did a energy discharge

wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> "Good, the will is a powerful thing.  But also a fragile thing.  
But you know that, right?"
> Malice freed his sword arm and wrapped it around Blacknightmare, 
and now he was holding her close still looking deep into her 
optics.  His energy field changed, from white to red.  This new 
destructive field began to eat away at the floor, and would soon 
begin to damage Blacknightmare.
>

<DIV>Malice:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The discharge damaged the soft flesh on his elbows.  His right arm dropped a little, but his left remained.  The wounds began to heal, and Malice chuckled a little.</DIV>
<DIV>"My, that hurt a little.  I didn't expect that, though.  You thought I was going to kiss you?  You were right-"</DIV>
<DIV>He immediatly leaned down a kissed the femme on the lips.<BR><BR><B><I>airly2000 <airly2002@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid"><TT>Blacknightmare::<BR><BR>"I've tought that you would kiss me"asais seriuosly the femme" and <BR>it's eems that I havne't other choice to do this!!!! "<BR><BR>Blak Nightmare took Malice arms and did a energy discharge<BR><BR>--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> <BR>wrote:<BR>> Malice:<BR>>  <BR>> "Good, the will is a powerful thing.  But also a fragile thing.  <BR>But you know that, right?"<BR>> Malice freed his sword arm and wrapped it around Blacknightmare, <BR>and now he was holding her close still looking deep into her <BR>optics.  His energy field changed, from white to red.  This new <BR>destructive field began to eat away at the floor, and would soon <BR>begin to damage Blacknightmare.<BR>> <BR>> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:<BR>> BlackNightmare:<BR>> <BR>> "My wish to fight still
